legal_basis: section 50 of the Federal Courts Act
Article 8 of the Commercial Arbitration Code
application_details: Booking Note contained a valid arbitration clause
decision_reasoning: Prothonotary incorrectly applied discretion under section 50
mandatorily referring the dispute to arbitration as required by Article 8
conclusion_outcome: proceedings are stayed in favor of arbitration
cause_of_action: Dispute over the application of an arbitration clause in a Booking Note
procedure_followed: Court reviewed the case de novo
